biotools.summary: BPrimm (Bayesian and Penalized regression in multiple loci mapping) includes a set of tools for simultaneously multiple loci mapping, and two novel methods named the Bayesian adaptive Lasso and the Iterative Adaptive Lasso

bioschemas.name: BPrimm
bioschemas.summary: BPrimm (Bayesian and Penalized regression in multiple loci mapping) includes a set of tools for simultaneously multiple loci mapping, and two novel methods named the Bayesian adaptive Lasso and the Iterative Adaptive Lasso
